message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, I'll try 55-45. Let's meet in the middle!

Meet me at 58.2-41.8, a slight tweak

You're really close, let's try 57.5-42.5. I'm willing to meet you almost exactly in the middle!
